title: Rodrigues, Laurain, Rodrigues, Guerreiro 2014 Alba
description: Ernesto Rodrigues, Louis Laurain, Guilherme Rodrigues, Ricardo Guerreiro ~ Alba ~ 2014 Creative Sources CS 248 CD. http://i4.imageban.ru/out/2017/07/09/3da9a7623684b90a89ebf4c66199464c.jpg 1 Alba 1 15:57 2 Alba 2 10:26 3 Alba 3 10:01 4 Alba 4 2:37 Guilherme Rodrigues: cello Ricardo Guerreiro: computer Louis Laurain: trumpet Ernesto Rodrigues: viola I’m starting to think that no free improvisation group that includes Ernesto and Guilherme Rodrigues could displease me. Alba is a session from June 2012. The instrumentation (in the order above) is: viola, trumpet, cello, and computer. Perfect chemistry, sonic molecules meet, briefly fuse, then go their own ways. Fine, subtle, sustained playing, and there’s no real dichotomy between acoustics and electronics (Guerreiro’s work is remarkable). Four 10-to-16-minute pieces, four highlights. - François Couture, Monsieur Delire
